from cb_kuaidan_sys_res where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND del_flag = "0"

from cb_kuaidan_sys_res where del_flag = "0" AND id IN (SELECT res_id FROM cb_kuaidan_sys_role_res WHERE role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by create_time ASC
